description:
*** One of the best educational apps of the year - Apple (iTunes Rewind) ***
Now you can learn to speak and read German while playing games on the go. Featuring  9 addictive games designed to teach essential vocabulary & conversation skills, MindSnacks’ German app is perfect for adults, kids, students and anyone hoping to visit Berlin, tour the German countryside or just cozy up to the language.

To help overcome the common challenges of learning German, our app is built around rich and engaging games instead of tedious flashcards. That means your eyes will be glued to your screen as you memorize words and master things like case usage, word gender and, of course, that irresistible German accent.

Download the first lesson totally free and if that’s not enough, upgrade to access all 50 lessons and 40+ hours of content. If you’ve got a touch-screen, a finger and a knack for learning, then you’ll be well on your way to shouting all-important phrases like “Bratwurst, please!” and “Extra sauerkraut!” all in perfect German. 

* PRESS *

USA Today
One of the top-three iOS apps that “make the process of learning new words fun.”

The German Travel Blog
Named the best app of 2011 for learning German

App Safari
"This app is not just your average, run-of-the-mill crash course... It includes complex exercises, challenges, and lessons that make the learning process fun and effective."

* FEATURES * 

-- 9 addictive and unique games
-- 1000+ German words & phrases to master
-- Spoken audio clips provided by a native German speaker to help with pronunciation
-- Hand-illustrated image library to help memorize words
-- 50 German lessons designed by Ivy League instructors (upgrade required)
-- Personalized learning algorithms to maximize memorization, retention & contextual usage
-- Enhanced review mode lets you replay previously mastered lessons
-- Additional quests & challenges will keep you motivated
-- More frequent high-fives due to a genuine sense of achievement and your massive acquisition of knowledge
 
* WHAT OUR (SUPER AWESOME) FANS HAVE TO SAY *

“MindSnacks’ German app has helped me so much! I just recently went on a trip to Germany and I felt like I had lived there all my life!” 

“This is a fantastic app, worth every penny!! I feel like the words really stick because you see it, hear it and spell it.”
“German always sounded like a hard language to learn but thanks to this app I’m enjoying it and loving it. Sooo worth it!”

* THE SCIENCE BEHIND MINDSNACKS *

At MindSnacks we like to keep it fun, but we’re serious about learning. That’s why our German app includes 9 challenging games designed by Ivy League professors. Each game teaches a specific aspect of the language, creating a well-rounded learning experience for both kids and adults that goes far beyond basic vocabulary flashcards. 

Of course studying is only worth it if it works, so our unique algorithm reinforces the learning process using proven methods from the field of memory studies. Over time, the games adapt to your individual performance, selectively repeating German words, phrases and grammatical points with which you’ve previously struggled. In other words, as you learn German, the app learns about you for a more effective learning experience.  

Perfect for beginning and intermediate learners, MindSnacks is like your own personal German teacher you can take just about anywhere . You’ll quickly spend less time looking at that German dictionary and more time planning that trip to Berlin.
